Class Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Tile extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a tile used within the game structure. A tile has a specific type identified by a TilesType and an array of four connectors described by ConnectorTypes. The methods in this class reveal the nature of a tile: its type and the connectors that it exposes.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile(Tile.Type type, String connectors)
      Constructs a Tile with a specified type and connector configuration. It uses ConnectorType.fromChar() for the conversion from String to ConnectorType.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the tile, represented by a TilesType enum.
      connectors - a string of length 4 representing the types of connectors on the tile.

    • Tile

      public Tile(String s)

    • Tile

      public Tile(Tile.Type type, Map<Tile.Side, Tile.ConnectorType> connectors)
      Constructs a Tile with a specified type and connector configuration.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the tile, represented by a TilesType enum.
      connectors - a map of sides and connectorTypes

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public Tile.Type getType()
      Retrieves the type of the tile.
      Returns:
      the TilesType representing the type of the tile.

    • getConnectors

      public Map<Tile.Side, Tile.ConnectorType> getConnectors()
      Retrieves the array of connector types associated with the tile.
      Returns:
      The map of ConnectorType representing the connectors of the tile.

      public String connectorsToInt()
      Retrieves the connector type associated with a specific side of the tile and sets a value to describe the tile's connectors

    • getSide

      public static Tile.ConnectorType getSide(Tile t, Tile.Rotation rotation, Tile.Side side)
      Get the side of a tile rotated clockwise n times.
      Parameters:
      t - the tile
      rotation - the number of rotation to make before getting the side
      side - the side to get
      Returns:
      the rotated side

      public static boolean real(Tile t)
      Check if a tile is not a placeholder.
      Parameters:
      t - the tile to check
      Returns:
      true if it's real false if its placeholder

      public static List<Tile.Side> shieldCoverage(Tile.Rotation rotation)
      Sides covered by the shield. Does not check if the tile is a shield tile.
      Parameters:
      rotation - of the tile
      Returns:
      the 2 sides that are covered by this rotation of the shield
